author: dkulp
msg: * Update 3party stuff to include jetty licenses
* Refactor much of http transport into base classes to be used by both jetty and servlet
* Implement initial CeltixServlet for deploying services into an appserver
* Create a default web.xml for CeltixServlet (deploys servlet into "celtix" context)
* Update hello_world demo to add a "war" target to build a war for the demo.  Deploying the war is up to the user.
* Add "client-servlet" target to hello_world for invoking against a servlet (must pass -Dbase.url=http://localhost:8080 to provide information as to where the app server is running)
* Implement very basic "GET" support in servlet and http transports.  If the WSDL doesn't have imports, it should be OK and usable.
* Add all the demo "build" directories to svn:ignore
* Clean the async_bindings file on clean
